changeSet.author: mlabio
changeSet.sql:
insert into hospitalpatients(Id, PatientId, HospitalId) select uuid(), id, 'test' from patients where `name` is not null and id not in (SELECT patientid from hospitalpatients);
insert into hospitalpatients(Id, PatientId, HospitalId) select uuid(), id, 'RX1PH' from patients where `name` is not null and id not in (SELECT patientid from hospitalpatients);
